lead_paragraph: Newcastle United fought back from two goals down at halftime to stun a Liverpool side already shocked by news that their defender Mamadou Sakho is being investigated by UEFA after failing a drugs test.

headline.print_headline: Newcastle Strike Back From Two Down to Deny Liverpool
headline.main: Newcastle Strike Back From Two Down to Deny Liverpool

snippet: Newcastle United fought back from two goals down at halftime to stun a Liverpool side already shocked by news that their defender Mamadou Sakho is being investigated by UEFA after failing a drugs test....
